alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:36PM EDT until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers and creek in Indiana... Sugar Creek near Edinburgh. White River at multiple locations. Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. Youngs Creek at Amity. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg and Hazleton. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Excessive rainfall continues to drive area waterways higher, and this is pushing Sugar Creek at Edinburgh into flood. The water level is expected to continue rising overnight. At present it is forecast to crest slightly over 1 foot above flood stage, but later forecasts likely will differ from this initial prediction. Please stay abreast of the latest conditions by monitoring further information from the National Weather Service and local media. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Youngs Creek at Amity. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Extensive flooding in progress along Youngs Creek. Flood waters affect parks, roads and a few residential and commercial areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EDT Friday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
